items.title: Front End Engineer

items.title: UI/UX Developer
items.description: Maintaining the design and functionality of e-commerces located in United States, some of those companies: Ascena group, Stadium Goods, Children Place. Those are some technologies used for the projects: HTML5, CSS3, JS, AJAX, JQuery, Sass, Node.js, Express, React, Redux, OOP, Functional Programming, Jira, Scram, CMS, Webpack, Grunt. Some pages where I participate in Eulas:  https://www.louandgrey.com/ https://www.anntaylor.com/
